post.html:
Introduction

Welcome to Fullstack App from Scratch with Next.js v2.

In this course we'll be building a complete fullstack app using the lates versions of React (v18) and Next.js (v13).

Note: This courses uses Next.js version 13.1

Code Repository

This course builds an app from scratch. The final code can be found in this repository. There are branches representing ✔️ Code Checkpoints. These have been added throughout this course website, and can be used to check your code.
post.title: Introduction
